modName: Vahlok the Jailor's Mask-New Dragon Priest Mask
summary: Vahlok is the only Dragon Priest without a mask, now I gave him one, uses Dragonborn masks model, it is heavy armor, enchanted with 50% cooldown reduction for shouts and with 100 extra magicka.
descriptionHtml:
Vahlok is the only Dragon Priest without a mask, now I gave him one.

Uses Dragonborn masks model, stats and is classified as heavy armor.

Enchanted with Fortify Shouts 50% and Fortify Magicka 100 points, I think that is fair and useful for a Solstheim based mask you cant obtain early. It makes Dragon shouts more useful, especially those with long cooldowns, and extra magicka is useful for many types of characters.

Requires:

Skyrim 1.9
Dragonborn

Installation:

Extract VahloksMask.esp to your /Skyrim/Data folder.

Delete VahloksMask.esp to uninstall.
author: Darth Sidious
